item.title: China says U.S. is trying to 'bully' the rest of the world with tariffs
item.description: China accused the U.S. on Thursday of trying to "choke the throat" of other countries, including its own, and said it won't engage with President Trum...

item.title: Zeldin to pursue new ban on animal testing at EPA
item.description: Administrator Lee Zeldin plans to revive a ban on animal testing at the Environmental Protection Agency, The Washington Times has learned.

item.title: House passes bill to limit nationwide injunctions as orders pile up against Trump

item.title: Trump targets more law firms
item.description: President Trump tightened the screws on the law firm Susman Godfrey LLP for actions the administration deemed to be against the government.
